movies.name: Saving Private Ryan
movies.description: A group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrive a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

movies.name: Raiders of the Lost Ark
movies.description: An archaeologist is hired by the U.S. government to find a gold-covered wooden chest before the Nazis.

movies.name: Raging Bull
movies.description: A violent-tempered boxer makes his way to the top and leaves his old life behind.

movies.name: Jurassic Park
movies.description: During a preview tour, a theme park suffers a major power breakdown and finds its cloned dinosaur exhibits have run amok.

movies.name: It's a Wonderful Life
movies.description: An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like if he never existed.

movies.name: Gone With the Wind
movies.description: A manipulative women and a roguish man conduct a turbulent romance during the American Civil War and Reconstruction periods.

movies.name: Forrest Gump
movies.description: A simple man with a low IQ waits at a bus stop and shares life stories with strangers.

movies.name: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial
movies.description: A troubled child finds the courage to help a friendly alien escape Earth and return to his home world.

movies.name: Bonnie and Clyde
movies.description: A bored waitress falls in love with an ex-con as they run across the country robbing banks together.

movies.name: Titanic
movies.description: A 17-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind, but poor, artist aboard in a luxurious, ill-fated ship.

movies.name: The Wizard of Oz
movies.description: A young woman is swept away in a tornado from a farm in Kansas to a magical land.

movies.name: The Sound of Music
movies.description: A woman leaves an Austrian convent to become a governess to the children of a naval officer widower.
